Module com.groupthree.mancala
Package com.groupthree.mancala.gameplay

Class Store

java.lang.Object
com.groupthree.mancala.gameplay.Store
public class Store extends Object
The Store class represents a container for storing stones in a game.
Version:
1.0
Author:
mofe
